name: Glow LEDs
description: Created and maintain website using the MERN Stack with Typescript, Redux and SCSS. Design and manufacture products in house using Fusion 360, and Arduino to program LEDs.Developed an automated a shipping label system using the EasyPost API to generate labels for customer orders. Optimized SEO by making human readable pathnames and setting up a sitemap.  Manage an affiliate team of 20+ people to participate in marketing campaigns and product releases. Responsible for Customer Service, Product Development, Project Management, Data Analytics, SEO, Marketing, and Business Management within the company.

name: CoLab
description: Co-Lab is an app that lets you find real-life team members for any project you can dream of! Other sites like TeamFind allows users to find online teammates, but Co-Lab is here for those who prefer face-to-face interaction. The team is as follows

name: Livdin
description: Livdin is a web application that lets users post reviews on previous and current places of residence. The application was designed with the idea of giving individuals a space to review their current place of residence free from the real estate pressure.

name: Ping Pong Ball LED Matrix
description: This is a fully 3D Printed LED Matrix with Ping Pong Balls as diffusers. I created this because of my love for LEDs and my drive to learn how to program them.
technologies: 5V 6A 30W Power Supply, Overture White PETG, 100 Ping Pong Balls

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather Dashboard is a nice and simple way to view the weather without all the noise from ads and other features that you just don't care about. No more wondering if your looking at the correct forcast in your area!

name: Date Night Recipes
description: Have you ever been preparing for a date, deciding to stay in or go out. But terrified of what you'll make if you stay in? Well look no further. Date Night Recipes can provide you with gourmet meals and cocktail recipes all in one place. Giving you the best date experice that you have ever had!

name: 3D Printing Quiz
description: Did you even Want to test your 3D printing knowledge? On a nice easy to use UI? Now heres your chance! I created this app with the maker in mind. Making the questions challengeing but doable.

name: Password Generator
description: Security is a big deal now a days. No one is safe. But some are safer than others. With this password generator you too can be one of the safe ones. With the ability to choose the length, and type of characters. You will be the safest on the internet!
